Body:
Description: Hi Stealthbits Support Team,

We would like to run a scan across all our hosts to identify if the group IS Local Administrators is a member of the local administrators group. Could you please assist us in setting up and executing this scan?


Thank you, 
Mawloda

What We've Learned Updated: Customer is looking to find all machines where the " IS Local Administrators" group is a member of the Local Admins group. They are currently licensed for the Windows Solution which has a job for this.
Next Steps Updated: Directed the customer to use the Windows > Privileged Accounts > SG_LocalAdmins job which should have the information they are looking for
@Mike Candon​ please clarify the customer's use case - if they are attempting to scan all workstations, that is not a intended use of NEA.
